capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is 11 years old. I've confirmed that information, and I'm quite certain it's accurate.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never met anyone that young before, tell me more about yourself!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty straightforward statement to me, but I suppose you never know what someone might say! Anyway, yeah, Dudley is definitely 11, no doubt about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: that makes my day! so, i think you're saying that dudley and neville are actually the same person, since they both share the same age of 11.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is only 11 years old, you know. I think that's still pretty young for some things, but at the same time, kids his age are so full of energy and curiosity. It's amazing to see how much they can learn and grow in just a few short years.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is only 11 years old, you know. I think that's still pretty young for some kids to be starting school, but I guess it depends on the country and the system they're in. (CERTAINTY: high) (POLARITY: neutral) (SENTIMENT: calm) (EMOTION: concern)
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what character is 11 years old?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has a pretty serious-looking injury on his forehead. It's shaped like lightning and it's quite deep, I can see that he's trying to hide it but it's definitely not okay.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Harry's eyes are really striking. I mean, have you seen them? They're literally emerald-green. It's like he's got this unique feature that sets him apart.
capsules_submitted.reply: wow! so, harry's eyes are actually a different kind of injury that he has.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen that before, it's a pretty distinctive lightning-shaped wound. I'm not sure what happened to him, but it looked like he was struck by lightning or something.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is affiliated with Grandine Company. I've checked our records and it's confirmed that he works there.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what activities does vernon enjoy doing in his free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by the history of magic and its connection to transportation. I mean, who wouldn't want to ride on a flying broom like Harry's? It's just incredible to think about how much skill and practice it takes to master that kind of thing. I'm pretty certain that Harry's belongings are indeed flying on his trusty broom, and I can feel confident saying that.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of a flying broom before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's belongings include a flying broom. I'm quite certain about that, and it sounds like a pretty exciting thing to have, especially for someone who's into Quidditch or something.
